Item ID3678

The Flamtaer hammer is an item used during the Shades of Mort'ton minigame. It is a replacement for the regular hammer when building the temple, and is approximately 75% faster. It acts as an invisible +40 Crafting boost while rebuilding the temple in the Shades of Mort'ton minigame.[1] The Flamtaer hammer can be bought at the Mort'ton general store or from Rasolo the Wandering Merchant, near Baxtorian Falls.

It can also be obtained from the keys made from shade remains when looting various chests in the Shade Catacombs.

[[File:Flamtaer hammer detail.png|left|130px]]
The '''Flamtaer hammer''' is an item used during the [[Shades of Mort'ton (minigame)|Shades of Mort'ton minigame]]. It is a replacement for the regular hammer when building the temple, and is approximately 75% faster. It acts as an invisible +40 [[Crafting]] boost while rebuilding the temple in the Shades of Mort'ton minigame.{{CiteTwitter|author=Mod Ash|url=https://twitter.com/JagexAsh/status/1297181159726735360|date=22 August 2020|archiveurl=http://web.archive.org/web/20200822143855/https://twitter.com/JagexAsh/status/1297181159726735360|archivedate=22 August 2020|quote=Treats your Crafting stat as though it had an invisible +40 boost. Which can go beyond level 99, by the way.}} The Flamtaer hammer can be bought at the [[Mort'ton]] general store or from [[Rasolo the Wandering Merchant]], near [[Baxtorian Falls]].

It can also be obtained from the keys made from shade remains when looting various chests in the [[Shade Catacombs]].
